name: goodreads_scrape_genre
description: Browse books by genre on Goodreads. Returns popular books in the specified genre.

steps.code: const books = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('div.elementList, [class*="BookCard"], .leftContainer .bookBox')).slice(0,30).map((el,i) => { const t = el.querySelector('a.bookTitle, a[href*="/book/show/"]'); const a = el.querySelector('a.authorName, a[href*="/author/"]'); const r = el.querySelector('[class*="minirating"], .greyText.smallText'); return { rank: i+1, title: t?t.textContent.trim():'', url: t?t.href:'', author: a?a.textContent.trim():'', rating: r?r.textContent.trim():'' }; }).filter(b=>b.title); return { genre: '{{genre}}', book_count: books.length, books, url: window.location.href }
